name: Isaiah Misajon Project 4
description:
1: This program will allow users to draw using various shapes and colors. On the top left, users will be able to see the mouse's x and y position on the screen at all times. Users will then be able to choose between spheres, cylinders, and capsules and customize the shapes' color by left clicking and dragging the colors sliders. Users will also be able to choose if they want their shapes to expire after three seconds by toggling or untoggling the Toggle Time Destroy button. Then the users can right click and begin to draw what they want using their chosen shape and color.

2: There is now a clock on the top left that updates in real time which can be useful for seeing how long the objects stay on the screen. Users can toggle this clock on and off. The program now also has the option to randomize the color of the object. At the bottom of the screen, there is also now an option to delete all objects drawn.

3: This program now has added animations. Press 2 to have the shapes begin to oscillate and 3 to have the shapes rotate. Press 1 to stop the animation.
